Description:

Demo for a Boneworks style hexabody player controller. 

Included spider man climbing and web slinging just for fun.

Controls:

Oculus:

  • Calibrate Height: X
  • Jump: A
  • Crouch / Stand: Right Joystick
  • Sprint: Click Left Joystick in
  • Grab / Climb: Grip
  • Spider Rope: Trigger
  • Spider Rope Pull: B

Knuckles: (XR Input is trash here so bare with me - avoid using grip squeeze)

  • Calibrate Height: Grip / Left A
  • Jump: Grip / Right A
  • Crouch / Stand: Right Joystick
  • Sprint: Always sprinting since XRInput things joystick is constantly clicked
  • Grab / Climb: B
  • Spider Rope: Trigger
  • Spide Rope Pull: B 

Vive: (good luck)

  • Calibrate Height: Left Menu
  • Jump: Right Menu
  • Crouch / Stand: Right TrackPad Down / Up + depress
  • Sprint: Double click in left track pad and maintain momentum
  • Grab / Climb: Grip
  • Spider Rope: Trigger
  • Spide Rope Pull: Grip 

WMR

  • Calibrate Height: Left Menu
  • Jump: Right TrackPad down depress
  • Crouch / Stand: Right Joystick
  • Sprint: Right TrackPad - right depress
  • Grab / Climb: Grip
  • Spider Rope: Trigger
  • Spider Rope Pull: Grip
